name: Dreamwake
description:
Who knows whether you're awake or dreaming?

Go ahead and help this little constellation figure it out for herself. Dont worry, it is quite capable in traversing the many obstacles in its way. It's a dream after all or is it? Whatever, why shouldn't it be able to place platforms.

Features

It's a puzzle platformer, by placing platforms where ever you want on the screen you'll be able to get past the many obstacles, however they dont last that long so you should think smart.

Controls

A/D to walk

W/Space to jump

Left Mouse button to place
